extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.title: Uhhh
reviews.comment: Please fix. The while phone shuts down when I try to open.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Needs pinyin aswell . Also no full version yet.

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Brill. Please make a full version! personally i love the way it has no pinyin, It helps me learn the characters!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please add pinyin!
reviews.comment: Clever way to learn chinese vocabulary, I would give five stars if it had pinyin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: OK to learn zhongguoren Chinese language  you need to know Pinyin!! This just shows hanzi or Chinese characters with pictures. A boy sitting how would you know what they are talking about if you don\'t know Chinese. You get the answer right but you don\'t know what is really being said no translation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: when i try to start it its crashing. so 1 star for this piece of garbage.
reviews.author: Dostya Vlasova

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: I\'m sure the app could be great, but unfortunately it crashes trying to download the needed packages
reviews.author: A Google User
